scripts.copyfiles: cd ../../composable-ui/ && cp -R node_modules/@klevu/ui/dist/klevu-ui/assets/ public/assets/ && mkdir -p src/components/klevu && cp ../packages/klevu/copythese/klevu.tsx src/components/klevu/klevu.tsx && cp ../packages/klevu/copythese/\[slug\].tsx src/pages/category/\[slug\].tsx && cp ../packages/klevu/copythese/search.tsx src/pages/search.tsx && cp ../packages/klevu/copythese/klevustyle.css src
